data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
These modules use WordNet to compute the semantic relatedness of
    word senses in WordNet. Also, there is already a prel interface to
    WordNet called WordNet::QueryData which uses the WordNet
    namespace... I don't know if the WordNet namespace has been
    registered, but it made sense to distribute WordNet related modules
    under the WordNet namespace.

    The "Similarity" part of the module name stems from the fact that
    the modules measure the semantic relatedness or the semantic
    similarity of word senses.
